snippet: Two years after the earthquake, some progress has been made, but the Haitian government badly needs a national strategy to do much more.
abstract: Editorial asserts that the Haitian government badly needs a national strategy for creating permanent housing and jobs two years after the disastrous January 12, 2010, earthquake; offers hope that 2012 will be the year in which Haitians take control of their rebuilding, with continued outside help.
lead_paragraph: Two years after the earthquake, some progress has been made, but the Haitian government badly needs a national strategy to do much more.
